overview: This film describes the simple rural youth Mao Sanjin who went to the city to go to relatives, intending to make a career in the metropolis, but didn't want to be involved in a family struggle. After seeing the warmth and warmth of the city, after fighting over and over, Mao Sanjin I was extremely disappointed in the city, and finally returned to my own life and reaped love.
title: Crazy Beans
